sub_title: Product Owner at ICMI, Inter IKEA Systems
summary:
Accomplished leader with extensive experience bridging the gap between insights and operational business decisions.

Market Research professional with 18 years’ experience across various industries, specializing in business opportunities identification through integrated insights mining and analytics. Experienced in global cross-functional team coordination and management, product development and implementation, change management. Led the development of 30m Euro product achieving 14% CAGR in FY 2015-2018. Skilled at translating insights into business decisions, architecting operational processes, systems, and protocols to ensure operational excellence. Worked across various functions, namely operations, data analysis, client solutions / custom research, sales, product development.

Competences:
• Consumer / Customer / Market / Shopper Insights
• Decision Making
• Strategic Planning
• Product Development
• Project Management (PMBOK)
• Relationship Management
• Cross-functional Team Leadership
• Business Performance Management
• Change Management
• Stakeholder Engagement Management

profile_positions.description: Building the capability to measure and understand IKEA performance from a consumer and market perspective.
profile_positions.title: Insights Capability Leader

profile_positions.description:
Continued transformation of regional solution team by bringing together Consumer Insights and Marketing Effectiveness
teams. Improved productivity by implementing cohesive account planning across two product groups, introducing regional sales initiatives, and balancing product / price offer.

• Achieved double digit top-line growth.
• Achieved +80% renewal rate of large-scale research programs.

Milestone projects: Smoking Landscape and Consumer Segmentation (Africa).
profile_positions.title: Head of Consumer Insights and Marketing Effectiveness,  Clients Solutions, Eastern Europe

profile_positions.description:
Drove local Consumer Insights teams through the change. Played vital role in executing the divestment process. Led accelerated growth of digital business. Facilitated global product launches.

• Transformed seven local teams (3-20 professionals) into one highly capable regional organisation.
• Improved profitability through implementing containment and winding down about 100k Euro of loss-making initiatives.
• Completed divestment process on the regional level smoothly transferring sold business to the strategic investor.

Milestone projects: GfK Consumer Insights Engine launch in Eastern Europe.
profile_positions.title: Head of Consumer Insights, Clients Solutions, Eastern Europe, Middle East and Africa

profile_positions.description:
Led the full cycle product development of €30M product portfolio, from product vision through implementation:

• Achieved product revenue growth CAGR 14% in FY2015-2018.
• Launched U&A 2.0. product offering based in data integration.
• Built end-to-end product delivery chain, including streamlined project management process, 
   established centralised delivery teams, automated project delivery (scripting, data processing, 
   charting), standard pricing.
• Managed cross-functional product team distributed across the globe.

Milestone projects: Future of Mobility 2030 (global), Innovation Roadmap in Fintech (Mexico), Growth Opportunities in Desktop computing (global).
profile_positions.title: Global Product Director, Market Opportunities

profile_positions.description:
Launched and managed two distinct product portfolios. Managed high performing teams and diverse product portfolio, achieving business growth targets.

• Built from the ground Shopper Insights practice with +€1M turnover: established the company presence in the area, developed internal capabilities, trained and coached sales and execution teams, established external partnerships to deliver best in class shopper marketing solutions.
• Achieved revenue growth of Market Opportunities and Innovation business by CAGR 10% (FY2012-2014).
• Led the operation side of Pricing Research delivery hub in CEE, supporting selling and executing pricing research in the region.

Milestone projects: Optimising customer acquisition and delivery process for e-commerce client (Russia), Cash Zone Optimisation (Russia), On-Shelf-Availability Optimisation for Desserts category (Russia), Shelf Layout Optimisation for Whisky category (Russia), Price Strategy and Promo Optimisation for Tea category (Egypt), Innovation Roadmap for Shampoo brand (Russia).
profile_positions.title: Country Product Head for Shopper Insights, Market Opportunities and Innovations

profile_positions.description:
Built resilient business with top CPG clients. Served a mediator between the clients’ stakeholders and insight function transforming needs of business into relevant research programs and translating insights back into business strategies and tactics.

• Key clients: Pernod Ricard (account manager in 2007-2014), Bacardi, Russkiy Alcohol, AB InBev, SAB Miller, Heineken, Baltika / Derbes, Mars, Ferrero, Unilever, Tata Group, Mayski Chai, Dixi, Meridian, Hochland, etc.
• Led the operation side of Pricing Research delivery hub in CEE.

Milestone projects: Alcohol Market Segmentation (Russia, Kazakhstan), Price Strategy and Promo Optimization for Tea category (Egypt), Beer launch volumetric forecasting (Kazakhstan).
